thread.title: PANTONE Unveils New Zine That Explores Seasonal Color Trends
thread.title_full: PANTONE Unveils New Zine That Explores Seasonal Color Trends

title: PANTONE Unveils New Zine That Explores Seasonal Color Trends
text: PANTONE Unveils New Zine That Explores Seasonal Color Trends By Yoon Sann Wong , 23 Feb 2017 Subscribe to newsletter Like us on Facebook Pantone Color Institute has debuted a new bi-annual magazine VIEWPOINT COLOUR that charts seasonal trends related to color. “Each issue includes visual imagery, material direction, and trend forecasts displayed in Pantone colors, along with color news and color psychology research.” “ VIEWPOINT COLOUR ’s lifestyle approach provides a global perspective across all design, making it relevant to today’s culture and critical to today’s color decision makers.” The publication, catered for graphics, fashion, and product designers, is available for global subscription at US$99.95.
